biotools.summary: New software for predicting the consensus secondary structure for a given alignment of RNA sequences. It uses an innovative classifier system (a hierarchical network of k-nearest neighbor classifiers) to compute for each pair of alignment positions a “base pair” or “no base pair” prediction.

bioschemas.name: KNetFold
